item.title: Anti-Collision Light Systems White Tail and Wing Tip Strobe Lights

remarks.para: May be inoperative for night operations provided the Red Upper and Lower Fuselage Beacon lights are operative.

numlitem.para: Night operations permitted if the red upper and lower fuselage beacon lights are operative.

placard.para: Placard near Beacon Light Switch: "WHITE TAIL and/or _____ WING TIP STROBE LIGHT(S) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
